about_the_game:
Body temperature normal, cardiorespiratory indices normal. Attention. The sleeper is ready to open:

As a participant in the Sleeper Program, you have been asleep for many years since the events of the Mechanical Rebellion. Now you are about to awaken at the scheduled time. It is normal to feel slightly dizzy or uncomfortable during this process, so please be patient as your body adjusts to the new environment -

During your slumber, the deterioration of our planet's ecological environment has continued to increase, with the spread of pollutants affecting most of the region, and the mutation of animals and plants not being effectively curbed.

According to intelligence, intelligent machines have begun to call themselves “Awakener” after taking control of the world, and in addition to them, some new races or forces have begun to operate in the world. Please keep an eye on them and be vigilant during your investigative missions.

Now, Investigator, as one of the members of the Fireseed, you will continue to participate in our cause and contribute to the inheritance and preservation of civilization. You are invited to set foot on this long-lost continent, to recover the precious relics and civilization heritage buried in the wilderness, and to unravel the world's unknowns in the process of exploration!

The flame of civilization is everlasting. May the fire guide your way!

[Game Contents]

Deck building gameplay

--Build and strengthen your deck from lots of cards, with more emphasis on randomness and card selection.

Strategy game elements

--Turn-based strategy War-chess Game, think carefully about your position and action.

Random Fun

--Randomized maps, events, and rewards make every exploration a new experience.

Cultivate different heroes

--You can recruit a wide variety of heroes, different races of heroes have different characteristics of the talent system.

Multiplayer Competition Mode

--Fight in the chaotic battlefield and win the honor of Fireseed Successor.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7/10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)

short_description: The Fireseed Treaty is a sci-fi strategy adventure game, combining turn-based strategy gameplay with deck building, hexagonal grid moves, and survival elements, as well as a variety of randomized events, relic rewards, and hero training to constantly upgrade your strategy.
